name: Baldi's Basics Medieval Edition 1.4.3 Port
description:
This is a Port of Baldi's Basics Medieval Edition

Somethings have been edited because this was on version 1.3.2.

An Android version is being worked on so don't ask for Android. 

Credits:

The Wizard Royal for sending me new music to use. And for the original mod.

Mystman12 for the original game

RealT5mpler for the Exit reached count tutorial
